name: Girl's Lovecast - Prologue Demo
description:
When a girl’s love is pure, it becomes a powerful magic. Through training, she can form it into a weapon, to defend what she loves. This is every Magical Girl’s first Lovecast.

Girl’s Lovecast is an action-adventure RPG about Magical Girls, and is currently under development. This demo contains the entire Prologue/Tutorial section of the game, and has roughly 2+ hours of content. It showcases the current state of some of the game's mechanics, such as combat, exploration, dialogue, and side quests.

I have published multiple versions of this demo in the past. This is the final version of this demo that I will publish until the full game is complete. Any further changes to this section of the game will be included in the full version of the game.

Art, assets, music, story, and programming by me.

“You Can Count On Me” written by me, with a guitar performance by Hugh Harsher.
